publication.title: Poster reception - Human arterial tree simulation on TeraGrid
publication.authors: leopold grinberg,suchuan dong,alexander yakhot,george e. karniadakis,nicholas t. karonis
publication.keyword: Blood Vessel;Cardiovascular System;Complex Network;Data Distribution;Geographic Distribution;Large Scale Simulation;message-passing algorithms;Numerical Simulation;Software Development;Blood Flow;
publication.abstract: The human arterial tree consists of a complex network of branching blood vessels leading from the heart to arterioles, capillaries, and venules - comprising the microcirculation. The numerical simulation of the blood flow in a single part of the human arterial tree requires hundreds of CPUs; a full human arterial tree will require thousands of CPUs. Nowadays, we can use
